definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: of 1st month (loan-wd. fr. Bab. Nisannu, cf. Schr:COT Ne 1. 1 Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi. 1 (1892). 76; NH = BH; so Nab. Palm. v. Lzb:323);—only post-exil.: ´[[חׂדֶשׁ נ]] Ne 2:1 Es 3:7 ( + [[הָרִאשׁוֹן הַחׂדֶשׁ]]), = pre-exil. [[הָאָבִּיב]] ([[הׂדֶשׁ]]).—On sacredness of Nisan cf. also RS:Sem. i. 387; 2d ed. 406 f.
